title: Les Dernieres Vacances = the Final Holidays
description: In 1933, a couple on the verge of separation decide to sell the family country home. The mansion is a magic house, full of memories for their son Jacques and his cousins, specially Juliette. The teenagers decide to fight against the potential buyer, Gabard. Gabard is a seducer and is immediately smitten by Juliette. Faced with Gabard's interest, the teenagers realise they are in love with each other.  Credits: Producer, Pierre Gerin ; director, Roger Leenhardt ; writers, Roger Leenhardt, Roger Breuil, Maurice Junod ; photography, Philippe Agostini ; music, Guy Bernard. Cast: Odile Versois, Michel Francois, Pierre Dux, Renee Devillers, Jean d' Yd.
